item.description:
Wanna live the life of your dreams? First, dare to dream. Do YOU dare to dream? 

Maybe you have dreams but aren't living them. Why? Some people simply don’t believe their dreams are possible (e.g. I want ... but the reality is...), so choose to ignore them. Some people allow their fears to stand in the way of moving forward on their dreams. Some people believe they’re not worthy of a dream-come-true life. Others are so overwhelmed & stressed by their day-to-day circumstances that they’ve lost touch with their dreams & have no time or energy to think about their heart’s desires.    

The basic steps for pursuing your dreams are very simple & widely agreed upon. However, steps that are simple are not necessarily easy to take. And often, we take the necessary steps & never succeed. Why? Because there are 3 key factors that must be embodied in order to successfully be attractors of our dreams. We must prepare ourselves to move into action on our dreams. 

So what does it take to A.C.T. on your dreams?

Suzy Spivey, Certified Dream & Life Purpose Coach, will:

- discuss the 3 key "attractor" factors that are needed to successfully pursue your dreams

- share ways for you to address & embody each of these key factors &

- give you the road map of achieving your dreams

Be ready to A.C.T. on your DREAMS!

******************************************************

About Suzy Spivey:

www.suzyspivey.com
email: suzy@suzyspivey.com

Suzy brings contagious enthusiasm, passion & purpose as a Certified Dream Coach™, Certified Dance Instructor, TV Host & Producer, & Inspirational Speaker. 

Suzy was personally trained by Marcia Wieder, America’s Dream Coach & founder of Dream University (& personal coach to Jack Canfield). Her life purpose training was with Tim Kelly, founder of The True Purpose Institute. She has also trained in Voice Dialogue facilitation with Carole Kammen, founder of Pathways Institute. 

Suzy raises her clients' vibration through JourneyDance, a powerful expressive movement process, for mind-body-soul integration, that taps into their bliss. She studied with Toni Bergens, renowned creator of JourneyDance™.

She also uniquely integrates Dream Coach® Method & JourneyDance™, two renowned, holistic systems, in a body-mind-soul way, that accelerate your intentions (of your dreams) into action, & make it happen!

If you are in transition, feel stuck, or looking to make your dreams come true, contact Suzy for help in making the shift to move you forward. 

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in 

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

item.name: Daring to Dream? What It Takes to A.C.T. on Your Dreams
